name: Sundown Showdown (Skelzie)
description:
Four color-coded cowboys meet in the middle of a deserted desert. Each one wants to kill all the others for some reason. Fight to be the last one standing!

Controls

A gamepad is required to play Sundown Showdown.

  • Use the left analog stick to move. 
  • Hold down left trigger to go into aim mode. In aim mode, you cannot move, and your gun will steadily reload.
  • Press A in aim mode to fire your gun.
Made within 24 hours for CodeDay DFW February 2018, with art by Derran DeL Luck.
